t: Amazon, la marca más valiosa del mundo, rompe la barrera de los 200 mil millones de dólares | Press Release | Brand Finance
s: September 17, 2021 - Defendiendo su posición como la marca más valiosa del mundo por tercer año consecutivo, Amazon ha rebasado la hasta hoy inalcanzable barrera de US$200 mil millones, según el último informe Brand Finance Global 500, presentado el día de hoy en el Foro Económico Mundial en Davos.

t: Amazon Brand Registry Spain: Protect and build your brand
s: Start your brand’s Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon store.

t: TIME MAGAZINE - APRIL 10 / 17, 2023 - EL MUNDO DE BAD BUNNY - BRAND NEW: Amazon.com: Books

s: 17 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: Amazon Global Selling | Sell & Ship Products Internationally - Amazon
s: What is Amazon Global Selling? It's a program that allows you to sell your products internationally through Amazon. Providing you with direct access to millions of customers around the world.

t: Brand Finance: Amazon es la marca más valiosa del mundo
s: January 23, 2019 - Por año consecutivo, Amazon ha ocupado el primer lugar en el ránking de las 500 marcas más valiosas del mundo, determinado por Brand Finance.

s: Estudo divulgado durante Fórum Econômico Mundial em Davos confirma domínio da Amazon
